Title: Implement responsive React UI with <table> and two buttons (Executar/Limpar)
Milestone: M3 - Frontend UX + Integration
Labels: frontend,docs

## GitFlow Branch
- feature/M3-01-react-ui-table

## Goal
Implement the required UI: a `<table>` populated dynamically and 2 buttons.

## Functional Requirements
- UI must include:
  - `<table>` for users (nome/email/phone)
  - Button "Executar"
  - Button "Limpar"
- UI updates dynamically (no reload) after any action.

## Non-Functional Requirements
- Responsive layout
- Accessible buttons and table semantics

## Acceptance Criteria
- UI renders correctly on mobile and desktop widths.
- Table updates without page refresh.

## Deliverables / Evidence
- `docs/evidence/M3-ui.md` includes screenshots placeholders and dev run logs
